title: Welcome
text:
Welcome to My Academic Portfolio
I am Dr.¬†James Dan, a lecturer and researcher in time series analysis, machine learning, and applied statistics. I currently lecture at the Department of Mathematical Science, Redeemer‚Äôs University, Ede, Nigeria.
Explore this website to learn more about my academic journey, publications, research interests, teaching engagements, and professional contributions.

title: Research
text:
My work focuses on:

Time Series Analysis
Machine Learning in Health & Education
Biostatistical Modeling
Computational Statistics
Forecasting Techniques

Gender-Based Analysis in STEM Using ML Models
Statistical Models for Climate Data Interpretation
